title: FAD-Based Mobile Microlearning for Engineering Systems Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental engineering systems concepts and mathematical modeling
context.additional_context: Engineering systems competency enhancement program for non-degree-seeking adult learners, conducted in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze functional components of engineering systems with 80% accuracy using FAD
Learners successfully model real-world engineering cases with over 70% accuracy by applying FAD-based problem-solving strategies
Learners independently design system interaction relationships at least three times using FAD tools in mobile environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
